author: Janus Rose
title: We’re Running Out of Face Masks, But You Can Make One Yourself - VICE
description: We’re Running Out of Face Masks, But You Can Make One Yourself VICE Some health experts questioning advice against wider use of masks to slow spread of COVID-19 CBC.ca Wear a face mask if you feel it's necessary, but know it won't necessarily help The Globe a…
content:
Interest in DIY medical equipment has exploded in recent weeks, as the COVID-19 pandemic continues to cause severe shortages of masks, gloves, and other medical supplies.
